item.title: 【Asp】ASP 将一段字符串进行Base64解码
item.description: ASP Base64解码： Function Bd(byVal si) 'Base64解码 For n=1 To Len(si) Step 4 a=md(Mid(si,n,1)) b=md(Mid(si,n+1,1)) c=md(Mid(si,n+2,1)) d=md(Mid(si,n+3,1)) If b>=0 Then s=s+Chr(((a*4+Int(b/16)) And 255)) If c>=0 Then s=s+Chr(((b*16+Int(c/4)) And 255)) If d>=0 Then s=s+Chr(((c*64+d) And 255)) Next bd=s End Function Function Md(byVal s) B64C="ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/" If Len(s)=0 Then md=-1 Exit Function Else md=InStr(B64C,s)-1 End If End Function
